abstract: Congressional lawmakers, already conflicted about looming nuclear deal with Iran, press country to release all detained Americans.
lead_paragraph: Congressional lawmakers, already conflicted about an impending nuclear deal with Iran, are increasingly angry over the incarceration of American citizens in that country, where at least three are imprisoned.

headline.main: U.S. Lawmakers Press Iran to Free Jailed Americans
headline.print_headline: U.S. Lawmakers Press Iran to Free Jailed Americans

snippet: Congressional lawmakers, already conflicted about an impending nuclear deal with Iran, are increasingly angry over the incarceration of American citizens in that country, where at least three are imprisoned.
